name: Research
purpose: Understand the outside context of a product

name: Explorer
purpose: Understand people’s experience and behaviours based on data collected in person
accountabilities: Organising research sessions, unless they are part of user research days
Analysing results and documenting the insights
Exposing insights from research to internal project team (own initiative)
Exposing insights from research to clients (at least contribute)
Supporting other crew members during testing outside of user research days when necessary

name: Research coordinator
purpose: Keep research run smoothly and bring new insights
accountabilities: Monitoring the need for research in running projects
Helping different projects in determining the appropriate research format
Organising user research days (recruiting participants, organising rooms)
Carrying out or supporting research sessions during user research days

name: Research practices developer
purpose: Bring in state-of-the-art research methods that bring value to the rocket and its customers
accountabilities: Keeping up-to-date with user research trends and development
Investigating the potential of research methods for the rocket
Implementing new methods (incl. training other crew members)

name: Data scientist
purpose: Understand people’s behaviours based on aggregated data
accountabilities: Exposing insights from analytics to internal project team (own initiative)
Exposing insights from analytics to clients (at least contribute)
